item.title: Stellantis 发布利润预警，原因是全球市场和中国市场的竞争
item.description: Stellantis NV 周一下调了其指导目标，理由是全球行业动态恶化和中国在电动汽车方面的竞争等因素。【原文：Stellantis NV revised on Monday its guidance downward, citing a deterioration in global industry dynamics and Chinese competition on electric vehicles among other factors.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，字节跳动计划使用华为芯片训练新的人工智能模型
item.description: TikTok 的中国母公司字节跳动计划开发一个人工智能模型，主要使用华为技术公司（HWT.UL）的芯片进行训练，三位熟悉内情的人士表示，美国的禁令让这家社交媒体巨头转向国内寻找芯片。【原文：TikTok's Chinese parent ByteDance plans to develop an AI model trained primarily with chips from compatriot Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL), said three people familiar with the matter, as U.S. curbs turn the social media giant homeward in search of chips.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔将发表讲话，经济学家担心政策失误和选举风险
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）即将于周一发表讲话之际发布的一项对经济学家的最新调查显示，美国央行在通胀之战的最后阶段设定利率时出现失误是明年可能削弱经济的主要风险。【原文：A mistake by the U.S. central bank in setting interest rates during the last phase of its inflation battle is the main risk that could undercut the economy over the next year, according to a new survey of economists released as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell was set to speak on Monday.】

item.title: 美国股市涨幅扩大凸显对经济的乐观情绪
item.description: 更多股票参与了 S&P 500 指数创纪录新高的进程，缓解了人们对 2024 年大部分时间里涨势集中在少数巨型科技公司的担忧。【原文：More stocks are participating in the S&P 500’s latest march to record highs, easing concerns over a rally that has been concentrated in a handful of giant technology names for much of 2024.】

item.title: 早间竞价日经指数回落，中国反弹
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 刺激经济呼声高涨，中国工厂和服务业下滑
item.description: 中国 9 月份的工厂活动连续第五个月萎缩，而服务业则大幅放缓，这表明在今年仅剩三个月的时间里，中国需要更多的刺激措施来实现 2024 年的经济增长目标。【原文：China's factory activity in September shrank for a fifth straight month while the services sector slowed sharply, suggesting even more stimulus is needed to hit Beijing's 2024 growth target with only three months left in the year.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示中国服务业活动放缓
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，中国 9 月份服务业活动扩张放缓，新业务增长创下近一年来最弱纪录，尽管出口仍在加速增长。【原文：China's services activity expansion slowed in September as new business growth hit its weakest in nearly a year even as exports sped up, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 限购政策放宽，中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 周末，广州等一线城市取消了所有购房限制，上海和深圳也宣布计划放松主要的购房限制，中国房地产开发商的股票在周一大涨。【原文：Shares of China property developers surged on Monday after first-tier cities such as Guangzhou lifted all home purchase restrictions over the weekend, while Shanghai and Shenzhen announced plans to ease key buying curbs.】

item.title: 财新PMI显示中国9月工厂活动明显降温
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，由于国内外新订单降温，中国制造业活动在 9 月份急剧萎缩，工厂主的信心降至接近历史最低点。【原文：China's manufacturing activity shrank sharply in September as new orders at home and abroad cooled, pulling down factory owners' confidence to near record lows, a private-sector survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 9 月份中国制造业活动连续第五个月下降
item.description: 周一，一项官方工厂调查显示，中国 9 月份制造业活动连续第五个月萎缩，尽管萎缩速度低于 8 月份。【原文：China's manufacturing activity in September shrank for a fifth straight month, albeit at a slower pace than August, an official factory survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 中国采取刺激措施，日元企稳，美元下滑
item.description: 由于日本即将上任的首相表示货币政策应继续保持宽松，飙升的日元周一企稳，而美元则因投资者对中国经济转好的预期支撑商品货币而下滑。【原文：A surging yen steadied on Monday as Japan's incoming prime minister signalled monetary policy should remain accommodative, while the dollar slipped on commodity currencies underpinned by investor expectations of a turnaround in China's economy.】

item.title: 以色列加强攻击，中东供应风险导致油价上涨
item.description: 周一，油价走高，原因是以色列加强了对伊朗支持的部队的袭击，人们越来越担心中东产油地区可能出现供应中断。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Monday on increasing concerns of potential supply disruptions from the Middle East producing region after Israel stepped up attacks on Iranian-backed forces.】

item.title: 大多数亚洲股市保持稳定，日本利率担忧削弱日经指数
item.description: 由于中国宣布采取更多刺激措施，周一亚洲股市大多走强，但日经指数因担心日本新首相赞成利率正常化而跳水。【原文：Asia share markets were mostly firmer on Monday as China announced more stimulus measures, though the Nikkei dived on concerns Japan's new prime minister favoured normalising interest rates.】

item.title: 日本工厂产出下降，经济复苏步伐存疑
item.description: 受台风导致的汽车生产中断和美国销售疲软的影响，日本上个月的工厂产出出现下滑，政府和分析师警告说，低迷的前景为实现稳固的经济复苏设置了障碍。【原文：Japan's factory output tumbled last month driven by typhoon-led disruptions in motor vehicle production and weak U.S. sales, with the government and analysts cautioning about a subdued outlook that raises the hurdle for a solid economic recovery.】

item.title: SpaceX 为被困宇航员设计的太空舱停靠空间站
item.description: 据美国国家航空航天局（NASA）和太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）称，SpaceX公司的 "乘员龙 "太空舱已于周日抵达国际空间站（ISS），该太空舱将于明年将被困宇航员布奇-威尔莫尔（Butch Wilmore）和苏尼-威廉姆斯（Suni Williams）带回家。【原文：A SpaceX Crew Dragon space capsule, which is due to bring home stuck astronauts Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams next year, arrived at the International Space Station (ISS) on Sunday, according to NASA and SpaceX.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Glenview 计划采取激进立场，推动 CVS 进行改革
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，专注于医疗保健领域的 Glenview Capital Management 公司已在 CVS Health 建立了大量仓位，并将于周一与这家陷入困境的医疗保健公司的高层会面，提出改善其运营的方法。【原文：Healthcare-focused Glenview Capital Management has established a large position in CVS Health and will meet top executives at the struggling healthcare company on Monday to propose ways it can improve its operations, The Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 早间竞标：中国刺激政策、日本政治主导第三季度末
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 加州州长否决了有争议的人工智能安全法案
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）周日否决了一项备受争议的人工智能安全法案，因为科技行业提出了反对意见，认为该法案可能会将人工智能公司赶出加州并阻碍创新。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom on Sunday vetoed a hotly contested artificial intelligence safety bill, after the tech industry raised objections, saying it could drive AI companies from the state and hinder innovation.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，加州州长纽森否决了有争议的人工智能安全法案
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，加州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）否决了一项人工智能安全法案，因为该法案只适用于最大、最昂贵的人工智能模型，而其他模型则不受监管。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom has vetoed an artificial intelligence safety bill as it applies only to the biggest and most expensive AI models and leaves others unregulated, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing a person with knowledge of his thinking.】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团提升派息政策
item.description: 新西兰乳制品公司恒天然（Fonterra）周一表示，该公司已经升级了股息支付政策，现在将向股东支付盈利的60%至80%，而前五年的平均比例为50%。【原文：New Zealand dairy firm Fonterra said on Monday it has upgraded its dividend payout policy and will now pay shareholders 60% to 80% of its earnings, compared with an average of 50% for the previous five years.】

item.title: 工会称美国东海岸港口罢工将于周二开始
item.description: 目前尚不清楚在周一午夜最后期限之前是否正在进行或计划进行任何谈判。【原文：It was not clear if any negotiations were taking place or planned before the midnight Monday deadline.】

item.title: 特朗普将重申阻止新日铁收购美国钢铁公司计划的承诺
item.description: 根据共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在宾夕法尼亚州集会上的演讲预告摘录，他将于周日重申，如果当选，他将阻止新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）收购美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）的计划。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump will on Sunday reiterate a pledge that if elected, he will block Nippon Steel's planned purchase of U.S. Steel , according to an advance excerpt of his speech to a Pennsylvania rally.】

item.title: Downdetector 称，美国有 4 万多名用户的 Spotify 出现故障
item.description: 据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，音频流媒体平台 Spotify 周日有数千名用户出现故障。【原文：Audio streaming platform Spotify was down for thousands of users on Sunday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 中国将在 10 月底前下调现行房贷利率
item.description: 中国央行周日表示，将通知银行在10月31日之前降低现有住房贷款的抵押利率，这是中国经济放缓之际支持陷入困境的房地产市场的全面政策的一部分。【原文：China's central bank said on Sunday it would tell banks to lower mortgage rates for existing home loans before Oct. 31, as part of sweeping policies to support the country's beleaguered property market as the economy slows.】

item.title: 价格走低，澳大利亚下调商品收入预期
item.description: 澳大利亚周一小幅下调了对资源和能源出口收入的预测，原因是多种商品价格下跌和货币走强继续对政府的主要收入来源构成压力。【原文：Australia slightly revised down its forecasts for resource and energy export earnings on Monday as lower prices across a broad range of commodities and a stronger currency continued to pressure a key source of government revenue.】

item.title: 聚焦：自由港提高铜产量，竞争对手寻求交易以实现增长
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan）正在三大洲加大铜产量，但并不打算加入席卷采矿业的收购狂潮，分析师认为，该公司的这一战略很好地利用了清洁能源转型对红色金属日益增长的需求。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan is turbo-charging its copper output across three continents with no plans to join a buyout frenzy sweeping the mining industry, a strategy that analysts say positions the company well to capitalize on the clean energy transition's rising demand for the red metal.】

item.title: 中国表示将着力解决突出的经济问题
item.description: 周日，中国国家媒体援引中国内阁会议的消息报道称，中国将着力解决突出经济问题，努力完成年度经济社会发展目标。【原文：China said it will focus on solving outstanding economic problems and strive to complete annual economic and social development goals, state media reported on Sunday, citing a meeting of China's cabinet, or government.】

item.title: 电池金属交易势头强劲，LME落后于竞争对手的交易所
item.description: 在主导锂和钴等电动汽车电池用金属贸易的竞争中，伦敦金属交易所被甩在了后面，因为其他交易所利用从年度固定价格合同向期货套期保值的转变，势头正劲。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is being left behind in the race to dominate trade in metals used for EV batteries such as lithium and cobalt as other exchanges gain momentum, capitalising on a shift from annual fixed-price contracts to hedging with futures.】

item.title: 当一元店倒闭时，领取食品补助的美国家庭就失去了一条生命线
item.description: 纳什维尔 37 岁的拉翠娜-贝格利（Latrina Begley）或她六个孩子中的一个，几乎每天都会到家山下的家庭美元（Family Dollar）购物，用联邦食品补贴购买热狗、冷冻披萨和牛奶等主食。【原文：Nearly every day, Latrina Begley, 37, of Nashville, or one of her six children, shopped at the Family Dollar down the hill from their home, using federal food benefits to buy Hot Pockets or frozen pizza, and staples like milk.】

item.title: 1-8月中国国有企业利润同比下降2.1
item.description: 中国财政部周日在其网站上发表声明称，1-8月，中国国有企业利润同比下降2.1%。【原文：China's state-owned firms' profits were down 2.1% year for January to August from the same period last year, the Ministry of Finance said in a statement on its website on Sunday.】
